ComicInfo.Summary:
Three new stories this prog - Disaster 1990 (a prequel to Invasion which also stars Bill Savage), Project Overkill and the very first appearance of the ABC Warriors.
Cover: movie poster for James Bond: Moonraker
Judge Dredd - A Tale from Walter's Scwapbook (part 1) (John Wagner - Ron Smith - Tom Frame)Disaster 1990 (part 1) (Gerry Finley-Day - Carlos Pino - Steve Potter)movie feature - James Bond: MoonrakerABC Warriors - The ABC Warriors (Pat Mills - Kevin O'Neill - Peter Knight)Project Overkill (part 1) (Kelvin Gosnell - Ian Gibson - Jack Potter)Dan Dare - Servant of Evil! (part 19) (Tom Tully - Dave Gibbons)Book of Robots - cut-out collectable booklet (part 1) (art: Brian Bolland)
